a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Population having attained at least some formal education
Based on the population aged 15 years and older.
Data source: Our World in Data based on Barro and Lee (2015) and Lee and Lee (2016)
Note: Formal education is primary or higher. Regional estimates are population-weighted averages. Data for the years before 2015 are
estimates, while data from 2015 onwards are projections.
